Windlord::

"It's a pleasure that I helped"said Windlord"I don't enjoy with the 
destroction of a life, NightShade, even a Pred's life..." and 
looking to Denzaber he said "Well now that NightShade is repaired, 
we can lead her to Pred's territory, just to limits 'cause inside 
there we aren't welcome"said smiling Windlord "after that Denzabar 
we can meet Rodimus, he will be glad to meet ya"and loking to 
both "Agree?"
